altTitles.th: ความยิ่งใหญ่ในศิลปะการต่อสู้

description.en: True Heavens Continent is a place where those with great power can move mountains and overturn seas, kick the stars and step on the moon, punch through the sky and even shatter the earth itself! Ye Ming, a commoner born into a side branch within his family, sincerely and diligently tried to become stronger, hoping to avenge his parents’ deaths. As fate would have it, he obtained the "Divine Spirit Cloak", ingested the "Foundation Establishment Divine Pill", and cultivated the "Omnipotent Sutra". With his newfound power, Ye Ming begins his path of vengeance, mercilessly slaughtering any martial artists that dare stand in his way!In the face of deadly threats all across the continent, such as the Immortal Dynasty, the Great Eternal Sect, the Giant Barren Demon, and the Supreme Demon God, Ye Ming is determined that nothing will stop him! Whether god or demon, Ye Ming fears nothing! “I shall be the one who decides my own destiny!”
description.es: Ye Ming, a estrela em ascensão da Família Ye é considerado um gênio entre seus companheiros. Mas ele foi enganado por seu primo ciumento e ele cortou seus meridianos, aleijou suas habilidades e o abanou impiedosamente. Mas Ye Ming nunca desiste, porque ele sacrificaria tudo para se vingar de seus pais falecidos que foram assassinados pela família Huang. Mas ele não sabe que é considerado uma dor no pescoço para a família Ye, e uma grande conspiração paira na escuridão…
description.ru: Мин Е, восходящая звезда семьи Е, - гений среди своих сверстников-культиваторов. Но его двоюродный брат повредил ему меридианы, искалечил и безжалостно порезал сухожилия. Мин Е не сдается, потому что он пожертвовал бы всем, чтобы отомстить за своих умерших родителей, которые были убиты семьей Хуан. Он не знает, что его считают занозой в шее для семьи Е и хотят его убрать…
description.zh: 天元大陆，有大能力者可移山倒海，踢星踏月，拳破青天，脚碎大地！ 叶铭，一介凡流，庶子出身，为报血仇，自强不息。 机缘之下，获“神灵宝衣”，服“筑基神丹”，修“通天经图”。 心诚志竖，勇猛精进，凡挡修武之路者，杀无赦！ 不朽皇朝，万古大教，洪荒巨妖，擎天魔神，面对这漫天神魔，他无所畏惧，我命在我不在天
description.pt-br: O True Heavens Continent é um lugar onde aqueles com grande poder podem mover montanhas e derrubar mares, chutar as estrelas e pisar na lua, perfurar o céu e até mesmo destruir a própria terra! Ye Ming, um plebeu nascido em um ramo secundário de sua família, tentou sincera e diligentemente se tornar mais forte, na esperança de vingar a morte de seus pais. Como quis o destino, ele obteve a “Capa do Espírito Divino”, ingeriu a “Pílula Divina do Estabelecimento de Fundação” e cultivou o “Sutra Onipotente”. Com seu novo poder, Ye Ming inicia seu caminho de vingança, massacrando impiedosamente qualquer artista marcial que ouse ficar em seu caminho! Diante de ameaças mortais em todo o continente, como a Dinastia Imortal, a Grande Seita Eterna, o Gigante Estéril Demônio, e o Deus Demônio Supremo, Ye Ming está determinado a que nada o deterá! Seja deus ou demônio, Ye Ming não teme nada! “Serei eu quem decidirá meu próprio destino!

description.en: A story about the not so straightforward beginning of Nazrin and Shou’s relationship.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!
In expectation for SA, Sanae is seeking advice on how to be a proper playable character. Sakuya, however, has different plans.

altTitles.ja: Kocchi wo Mite Yo
こっちをみてよ

description.en:
71st Manga Audition, Excellence Award Runner-Up, Theme: The Moment One's Heart Flutters.

The struggles of a girl trying to impress the guy she likes at the beach.

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: クオーツの王国

description.en: "Angels"... are heroes who follow the will of the Goddess and protect the Quartz Kingdom from demons. Blue, an orphan born with dark wings, lives a peaceful life, dreaming of becoming an angel. But one day, after meeting a prince, her destiny begins to change.
description.ja: 「天使」ーー彼らは女神の意思に従い、クオーツ王国を悪魔から守る英雄。黒い翼をもって生まれた孤児のブルーは、天使を夢見る平和な毎日を送っていた。だがとある日、とある王子との出会いを境に、彼女の運命は動き出す。
description.ru: «Ангелы»... это герои, следующие воле Богини и защищающие Кварцевое Королевство от демонов. Блю, сирота, родившаяся с тёмными крыльями, живет мирной жизнью, мечтая стать ангелом. Но в один день, после встречи с принцем, её судьба начинает меняться.
description.es-la:
«Ángeles»… Aquellos que han heredado la voluntad de la diosa serán los héroes que protegerán al Reino del Cuarzo de los demonios. 

En estos pacíficos días una huérfana llamada Blue que nació portando alas negras, sueña con convertirse en un ángel. Sin embargo cierto día su destino cambiará luego de encontrarse con cierto príncipe.

title.en: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!

altTitles.ja: 一生わたしの助手でいて！

description.en:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?
description.ja: 持ち前の助手体質(つい手助けをしてしまう体質)のせいで日陰者だった御供助玖は、その状況を打破するため「トップになる」ことを最重要課題として生きてきた。しかし、転校先の高校で出会った探偵少女3人は、小学校の頃に探偵団を一緒にやっていた因縁の相手だった! 探偵(トップ)の座をかけた助玖の熱い戦いが始まる!! ただ‥‥彼女たちは違う意味で熱い想いを秘めていて‥‥!?

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. title.en: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi ~Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal~

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.ja: 【癒】の勇者ケヤルは、ある日【回復(ヒール)】が最強に至る魔法だと確信する。そして世界そのものを【回復】して四年前に戻り、自分の人生を弄んだ者たちへ復讐することを誓うのだった。
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

title.en: Sekai ga Hajimaru Asa ni Umi wo Mito

altTitles.ja: 世界が始まる朝に海を見た

altTitles.en: I saw the sea on the morning the world began

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Ngày Đại Dương Xuất Hiện

description.en:
Ao lives with his father, who has a bad drinking habit, in a town with a beautiful view of the sea. He spends his time trying to be as inconspicuous as possible, both at his high school and at home, as if he's holding his breath. One day, while on the way home from school, he meets Minato smoking a cigarette on the station platform. Minato, who works at a bento shop in spite of his blonde hair and piercings, can't stand the fact that Ao eats food from the convenience store every day, so he offers him a suggestion: "Instead of making you a bento every day, comment on my cooking"...?
The story of two young men who meet in a seaside town, and their once-in-a-lifetime true love.

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって言ったよね？

altTitles.en: You Said You Will Marry Me, Right?

description.en: The main character, who promised to get married when he turned 18, looked at his family and realized "marriage is hell," but it was already too late. His childhood friend has grown up into a super duper nutjob woman he can't escape from?!

altTitles.ja: 2.5次元の誘惑

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

title.en: I Became an S-Rank Hunter with the Demon Lord App

altTitles.ja: 魔王アプリでs級ハンターになれました

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou Apuri de Skyuu Hanta- ni Naremashita

description.en: There was a boy who lived in the present age of dungeons. His hunter aptitude was the lowest grade of “F,” which was a brand and proof that although he was a hunter, his power was not much different from that of ordinary people. One day, he is betrayed by his friends in the dungeon and left behind as a bait to a pack of demons. While hungry demon wolves devour the boy’s throat, he despairs of the unfairness of “talent” and continues his insatiable search for “power” – and he hears the voice of “the world”. -Strong desire of power confirmed- – Starting Demon lord application- As the vessel of the Demon lord power Player: Ijima Hiroto has been selected. The boy breaks through the “Wall of Talent” one after another with his overwhelming ability to grow through the “Demon Lord App” — The action drama of the young hunter oppressed by the world begins!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

title.en: The Martial Emperor's Life After Seclusion

altTitles.ru: Жизнь императора войны после ухода в отставку

altTitles.en: Life of a War Emperor After Retirement

altTitles.vi: Sinh Hoạt Của Võ Đế Sau Khi Ẩn Cư

description.en: Ever since he transversed into the realm, he turned into an adorable, lovely, androgynous man, who is coveted by many. Fortunately, Ling Ge has a mysterious physique and his strength automatically grows. After touring around Eastern China and finally suppressing the western gods in a single battle, he has been called the Martial Emperor since then. Subsequently, the androgynous martial emperor has been living in seclusion. Nonetheless, he became friends with a young loli, and the androgynous Martial Emperor came out of seclusion again!
description.ru:
В этом мире сила почитается превыше всего. И когда дело касается силы, Лин Гэ, с уважением признанный как императором войны, не имеет себе равных. После отражения вторжения божественных духов, прибывших извне, он почувствовал пустоту в душе и отправился жить вдали от мира. Но затем, по воле обстоятельств, ему пришлось встать на защиту соседской лоли-сестренки из созерцательного учения, из-за чего его жизнь изменилась.  
Также мы ищем сканы! Надеемся что вы нам поможете в их поисках.

title.en: Hiding a Warehouse in the Apocalypse

altTitles.en: Hiding a Logistics Center in the Apocalypse

description.en: Imagine you are stuck inside a warehouse while the world is experiencing an apocalypse. That’s exactly what’s happening to Jeong-gyeom, except he suddenly awakens a very odd but powerful ability to store anything in a parallel dimension, giving him the tools to defeat the creatures wreaking havoc on the world. But as he ventures into the ravaged city of Seoul, he realizes there is more to this apocalypse than meets the eye as he encounters other survivors and mysterious monsters on his quest to find his family.

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven "chosen heroes" meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly "useless" skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he's never seen before!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

altTitles.th: แปลงโฉมเธอจนเจอรัก

description.en: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

altTitles.ja: 先輩VS後輩ちゃん
勘違いされる後輩ちゃん

description.en: A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai, but she has a weak defense.

altTitles.es: Rurouni Kenshin: Una historia romántica de un espadachín de la era Meiji

altTitles.en: Kenshin the Wanderer: Meiji Swordsman Romance

altTitles.ja: るろうに剣心―明治剣客浪漫譚―

description.en:
140 years ago in Kyoto, with the coming of the American "Black Ships," there arose a warrior who, felling men with his bloodstained blade, gained the name Hitokiri, man slayer! His killer blade helped close the turbulent Bakumatsu era and slashed open the progressive age known as Meiji . Then he vanished, and with the flow of years, became legend.  
  
Ten years later, a young woman's life is saved when she happens upon a strange wandering swordsman named Kenshin. The young woman accepts the wanderer into her dojo, despite his secretive past, and the two become fast friends. As their relationship grows, they meet and make more friends (as well as enemies), and they grow accustomed to their life together.  
  
However, one man can only run from his past for so long, and it isn't long before Kenshin is forced to face the life he thought he'd left behind. Now, together with his friends, he must fight the ghosts of his past if he wants the people he loves to have any kind of future.  
  
Contains a side story called Yahiko no Sakabato.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X** (2001)

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shouki Desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ツンデレなわたくしが可愛いなんて正気ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shoki Desuka?

altTitles.en: Are You Serious Thinking a Tsundere Like Me Is Cute?

description.en:
Rose, a prideful and spoiled princess, is known for her arrogance and lack of charm, making her widely disliked. After a life-changing event, she decides to turn her life around and make amends for her past behavior. Her first step? Breaking off her engagement with her kind and supportive fiancé, Rein, to free him from being tied to someone like her.

However, to Rose's surprise, Rein doesn't react as she expects. Instead, he openly declares: "I can't help but find you irresistibly cute." Confused and flustered, Rose struggles to understand his feelings while grappling with her own emotions.

This romantic comedy explores themes of personal growth, self-worth, and unexpected love, all wrapped in the quirky charm of a tsundere protagonist.
description.ja:
わがままで傲慢で可愛げがない――嫌われ者の王女ローズはある出来事をきっかけに改心すると決意した。
手始めに婚約者のレインを自分から解放するため婚約破棄を言い渡す。しかし彼の返事は思いも寄らないもので……？
「生憎私には、あなたが可愛く思えて仕方ないのです」
あなた、正気ですか……！？

title.en: Kimi yo de Ato Mou Sukoshi

altTitles.ja: 君よであともう少し

altTitles.ru: Ещё немного, чтобы дотянуться до тебя

description.en: Haruko is a girl who worries about her height. Sho is a boy who worries about his shortness. Haruko befriends the cheerful Maki, Sho is friends with the caring Kouta. This is a warm and touching story about their youth.
description.ru: Харуко - девочка, переживающая из-за своего высокого роста. Сё - мальчик, переживающий из-за своего низкого роста. Харуко дружит с весёлой Маки, Сё - с заботливым Коутой. Это тёплая и щемящая история об их юности.

description.en:
In the world of "Karma," where myths and folklore are timeless echoes of truth, ancient tales gradually unveil their secrets. Each story, once considered mere legend, is now revealed as reality, shaping the world that we live in to this day.
As the story unfolds, we will see these truths that were veiled from humanity's eyes, revealing how these myths have come into existence and why they were hidden away from the modern day.
We follow the narrative through the eyes of Teru and his team, as they delve into the depths of each realm and unravel the mysteries that lie within. From distant lands to mythical beings, every encounter sheds light on the true history of our reality, revealing the path toward understanding our origins.

Co-creator/Illustrator - @artdawgsama
Co-Creator/Writer - @vanillabarss
Writer - @__ willcross __

description.en:
"A bargain for 5 billion marukas."

"Sure enough, it's a bargain."

'Ertha', who is destined to be eaten alive by the male protagonist bargained marriage with him to change fate! I was reincarnated into a rated 19+ male-oriented fantasy novel. As the original story goes, Ertha was eaten alive by the protagonist Zahid, but I can't die like that because I have my little siblings. I offered a deal to the main character who'd eat me up. I'm the target of the proposal, 5 billion Marukas! All I have to do now is run away before the main character gets a chance to eat me. Can I, Ertha, escape from the hands of Zahid, the greatest wizard in the kingdom?

---
Ertha Arlez is an impoverished purifier looking to provide for her family. Duke Zahid El Callenor is a wealthy and powerful magician looking to cleanse his evil energy. The two seem like a perfect match… except that Zahid is fated to eat Ertha alive! Ertha must keep the duke at arm’s length for her own protection, but the intimate purification process combined with Zahid’s nonstop flirting make that nearly impossible. Can she stave him off and stay alive, or will she be consumed by passion?

description.fr:
Elle s’est réincarnée dans un roman fantastique pour public averti! Une histoire si sombre qu’elle n’a jamais réussi à en lire la fin… Tout ce qu’elle sait c’est que son mari, un mage surpuissant, va finir par la dévorer vivante! Heureusement, elle a un atout de taille: elle est l’unique purificatrice de ce monde, la seule à pouvoir sauver les mages de la folie qui les guette, grâce à son toucher. Sauf qu’il se trouve que son frère et sa sœur sont aussi appelés à devenir des mages, et que son époux n’est vraiment pas partageur…

"Я переродилась в фэнтези-романе для мужчин в стиле 19 века. Согласно оригинальной истории, мне суждено быть съеденной главным героем Захидом. Однако я не могу просто так умереть, оставив своих маленьких брата и сестру. Поэтому я решила предложить сделку этому главному герою на сумму 5 миллиардов марок! Все, что мне осталось сделать, - это убежать от него через несколько лет, пока главный герой меня не съел.   
Сможет ли Эрта ускользнуть из рук Захида, величайшего волшебника Империи?"

description.tr: "Teklifim 5 milyar maruka." " Bu teklif uygundur." Erkek kahraman tarafından diri diri yenilecek olan 'Ertha', kaderi değiştirmek için onunla evlilik pazarlığı yaptı! Ertha, +18 bir fantezi romanına reenkarne oldum Orijinal hikaye devam ederken, Ertha kahramanı Jahid tarafından diri diri yenildi, ama ben böyle ölemem çünkü küçük kardeşlerim var. Beni yiyen ana karaktere bir anlaşma teklif ettim. Teklifin hedefinde ben varım ve 5 milyar Maruka karşılığında! Şimdi tek yapmam gereken, ana karakter beni yeme şansı olmadan kaçmak. Ertha, krallığın en büyük büyücüsü Zahid'in elinden kaçabilecek miyim?
description.pt-br: Ertha reencarnou em um romance de fantasia +18. De acordo com o plot original, ela será comida viva pelo protagonista, Zahid, e para mudar seu destino ela negociou um casamento com ele! Agora, tudo o que ela tem a fazer é fugir antes que ele tenha a chance de devorá-la. Poderá Ertha escapar das mãos de seu marido, o maior mago do reino?

description.en: Based on a wealth of research, the book examines the life of Mao Zedong, the bright star who laid the foundation of today's China. The young Mao Zedong, who carried the banner of revolution through an era of upheaval, is depicted with images of unusual power with distinctive penmanship from Fujiko A, better known for his work in boys comics.

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

altTitles.ja: しのびごと

description.en: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
description.ja: 時は現代！世を忍び悪を討つ公安忍部隊のヨダカは、女子高生・向日アオイの護衛を命じられる。極端にコミュニケーションが苦手なヨダカは目立たず生徒となりアオイを護る予定が、何故か彼女と友達になり!?
description.pt-br: Mesmo no Japão moderno, os ninjas ainda se escondem nas sombras. O jovem ninja Yodaka recebeu sua missão: proteger a estudante do ensino médio Aoi a todo custo. Mas um ninja pode sobreviver ao mundo selvagem do ensino médio e ao mesmo tempo cumprir sua missão?

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

title.en: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Bijutsubu Niwa Mondai Ga Aru!

altTitles.en: This Art Club Has a Problem!

altTitles.ru: С этим клубом точно что-то не так!

altTitles.ja: この美術部には問題がある！

description.en:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
description.ru: Это история о художественнм клубе старшей школы: о мальчике, отдающем свой талант рисованию "идеальных 2D-невест"; девочке, которая к нему неровно дышит; вечно спящем главе клуба; а также таинственной Колетт-сан и неопытной кураторше клуба. Все они странные и забавные люди, и с ними случаются странные и забавные происшествия.

title.en: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?

altTitles.ru: И почему мужчины не ходят на каблуках?

altTitles.ja: その男のハイヒール

description.en: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?
description.pt-br: Kim Manseok é um cara comum, mas com um hobby em particular: seu amor por saltos altos de alta qualidade. Ele possui seu próprio blog pessoal e é conhecido como mulher online, mas um dia sua identidade é exposta! Ele será capaz de continuar sua vida como um assalariado comum?

altTitles.ja: オフヴィレッジ 第三防御壁

description.en:
In that village, those who die rise again, transforming into what the locals call "Wandering Dead" that are neither fully alive nor completely dead. These wandering dead then feast on the living...

In the remote settlement of Sarugami Village, completely isolated from the outside world by three imposing walls and absent from all maps, an eerie phenomenon unfolds. The villagers know nothing of the outside world, they can only resist the suffocating scent of death that permeates their lives... It's a bizarre horror where conspiracy and madness intertwine.

altTitles.ja: 異世界性活のススメ

description.en:
One day, Keitaro unexpectedly transferred to a different world where he met Nia, a half-demon girl, who urged him to "make a child" with her. The two of them went traveling in search of gateways to different worlds when Rosette, another half-demon girl, appeared... The girls of a different world fight over the valuable "human male" using their sex appeal. ♡  


---

**Note:**  
The Japanese title is a play on words. The Kanji for 'lifestyle' is 生活 (seikatsu) but the author replaced 生 (sei) with 性 (sei), which becomes 性活 (seikatsu), or 'sexual activity.' Since they're pronounced identically in Japanese it gives it a double entendre, but this can't be translated in a way that retains that.
description.ja: ある日、突然異世界に転移した圭太朗は、半魔族の少女・ニアと出会うなり「子作りしたい」と迫られる。異世界の穴を探して旅するふたりの前に、半魔族の少女・ロゼットが現れて・・・・・・。貴重な“人間の男”を巡る異世界女子のアピール合戦♡

altTitles.ja: あずみ
少女杀手阿墨
百人斩少女

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.ja: 旧・茶道部の部室を不法占拠して勝手に「ごらくぶ」の活動を続ける、悪の4人組。正義の生徒会は、ならず者どもを一掃するためについに重い腰を上げたのだった…という展開ははっきり言って全くない、まったりコミック第1巻が登場。愛が溢れまくりで、明日からも元気に生きて行けること請け合い。よ～し、パパ二度寝しちゃうぞ～!!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: ガンスミスキャッツ

description.en: Girls, guns, and grenades! Meet Rally Vincent and Minnie May. By day, they work at the Chicago gun shop that they own. By night (or holidays or week-ends), they moonlight as a pair of bounty hunters called the Gunsmith Cats. Rally is an expert at firearms, being able to judge the condition of a gun with a glance, and being an expert marksman. Minnie May is younger and less disciplined; and has an absolute fascination with explosives. Lots of explosives. Especially big ones. Together, they form an unbeatable team; much to the consternation of the local ATF bureau. Set in the city of Chicago, this action-adventure series features a lot of gunfights, car chases, and general mayhem.
description.es-la: ¡Chicas, armas y granadas! Les presento a Rally Vincent y Minnie May. De día, trabajan en la armería de Chicago que poseen. Por la noche (o los días festivos o fines de semana), trabajan como un par de cazarrecompensas llamados los Gatos Armeros (Gunsmith Cats). Rally es una experta en armas de fuego, capaz de juzgar el estado de un arma con sólo una mirada, y siendo una experta tiradora. Minnie May es más joven y menos disciplinada; y tiene una absoluta fascinación por los explosivos. Muchos explosivos. Especialmente los grandes. Juntas, forman un equipo imbatible; para consternación de la oficina local de la ATF. Ambientada en la ciudad de Chicago, esta serie de acción-aventura presenta muchos tiroteos, persecuciones de coches y caos general.
description.pt-br: Garotas, armas e granadas! Conheça Rally Vincent e Minnie May. Durante o dia, elas trabalham na loja de armas de sua propriedade em Chicago. À noite (ou feriados ou fins de semana), elas trabalham como uma dupla de caçadoras de recompensas chamadas de Gunsmith Cats. Rally é uma especialista em armas de fogo, sendo capaz de julgar a condição de uma arma com um olhar e sendo uma atiradora experiente. Minnie May é mais jovem e menos disciplinada; e tem um fascínio absoluto por explosivos. Muitos explosivos. Especialmente os grandes. Juntos, elas formam uma equipe imbatível; para grande consternação do escritório local do ATF. Passada na cidade de Chicago, esta série de ação e aventura apresenta muitos tiroteios, perseguições de carros e confusão geral.

Belle poupée no Super Darling Konyaku: "Konomi ja Nai" to Iwareta Ningyou Hime, Gaman wo Yametara Ouji ga Deredere ni Natta. Jitsu ni Ui!

altTitles.en: Belle poupée's Engagement: The Doll Princess and the Smitten Prince

description.en:
【“If I’m going to be abandoned anyway, I’ll allow myself to act freely one last time” – A ‘reverse-overindulgence’ love story presented by Selen!】
Leticia, the duke’s daughter nicknamed “the Beautiful Doll (ベル・プペー),” possesses a delicate appearance. However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character.
A flawless and perfect duke’s daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes. A destined pair who support and love each other in a unique “reverse-overindulgence” love story.
※ This product is a serialized version, dividing the chapters of the original work *The Spudari Engagement of Belle poupée: The Doll Princess Who Was Told ‘I Don’t Like You,’ Stopped Enduring, and Made the Prince Head Over Heels. Truly Adorable!* into individual parts.

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーZX

description.en: All three Artists in one book. Digital Versions Delisted

altTitles.ja: 俺だけスーパーヒーロー

description.en: In an era of upheaval, humanity is forced to respond with weapons known as “Sacred Relics” that embody their very souls to combat monsters emerging from another world. Asahi Hinata, a young man with a promising future as the son of a hero, is about to attend the entrance ceremony at the National Valkyrie Academy. However, the Sacred Relic he receives is a hero suit that looks like it came straight out of a low-budget children’s hero show…Living day by day as an outcast at the academy, Hinata perseveres despite being disregarded by those around him. But one day, Hinata’s courage and resolve awaken a unique power within his hero suit…

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!
